item.title: ClientEarth: a significant milestone in the Court of Justice of the European Union's environmental law rulings
item.description:
Anna Dannreuther, Trainee, Research Department of the CJEU Background Yesterday, the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) issued its decision on a case referred by the UK Supreme Court. This case involved the UK’s failure to request an extension to meet nitrogen oxide limits as outlined in EU law. The environmental NGO, ClientEarth, brought the case forward in the UK, arguing that the UK was violating Article 13 of Directive 2008/50/EC (the ‘Air Quality Directive’)...
